name: What A Dig Move
description:
There has been a drought lately, so your garden has not been exactly thriwing. Fortunately, you have artifical water supply, and can water your delightful plants!

There are five plants that need watering, but you need to terraform your terrain first, so that the water can actually find its way to the plants. The water supply is limited, and so is your number of terraforming moves, so think carefully!

Controls

  • Use Left Mouse Button to Terraform the Terrain
  • Use Right Mouse Button to Move the Camera
  • Use Mouse Wheel to Zoom

Just hit Play after you prepare the terrain, and watch the water get to the plants. Or not. Depending on how you did!

GL&HF!
